Google is losing engineers frustrated by a shift in the culture that normally happens when a company gets as big as Google is, Seth Harris , technology practice head at Tim Cook Associates, told the E-Commerce Times. then-candidate Barack Obama in the 2008 election, but said Sunday on CNN's "State of the Union" that he will wait to make a decision on whom to support in the next presidential election. I'm not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley . "I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position." "
